item.title: Aikau Audit Report
item.description: EisenVault takes away the hassle of managing documents by storing them in both electronic and physical forms, enabling smart-search and deploying quick retrieval measures. Our innovative cloud-based document management system can be used in multiple industry sectors, and caters to specific requirements of various job roles. Our vision - to be your preferred partner for electronic and physical document management. This is EisenVault’s first Aikau plugin and we would like to share our experience building it.
